edu.packt.neuralnet.math

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.packt.neuralnet.math.Matrix
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IdentityMatrix

    public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has several methods to manipulate matrixes mathematically It is used by ELM and Levenberg-Marquardt learning algorithms
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Alan de Souza, Fabio Soares
